posts.message:
Software QC Engineer Job Vacancy 
Company: ATI Systems Inc.
www.atisystem.com
Company Info: A major supplier for Emergency Warning and Notification Systems, located in Boston, USA, is looking forward to new Software QC Engineer to join the QC team in its Cairo branch, located in El-Manial
Job Title: software QC Engineer
Job Field: Emergency Warning & Notification Systems
Department: Research and Development
Job Type: Full Time
Job Description: Looking for an individual to join our QC team with a view to a long term commitment to the company. The candidate will be responsible for performing tasks requiring planning, scheduling, and testing to assure that developed products meet design specifications and are within total quality management standards.  Candidate responsibilities will include the usual aspects of QC Engineer role including:
1. Reviewing and contributing to test plans. 
2. Analyze the test basis and Identify the test conditions
3. Preparation of test cases
4. Preparation of testing data and testing environment 
5. Execution of test cases 
6. Logging and reporting the results of test cases execution 
7. Supporting the development team regarding the reported quality problems 
8. Automate test cases 
9. Execute different types of testing: functional, security, performance, usability, etc...
Job Qualifications: 
1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science / Computer Engineering / Software Engineering/ Computers and information.
2. Minimum 1 year experience of software testing.
3. Good knowledge of software testing process 
4. Good command of written and spoken English is a must.
Interested candidates send C.V to     Junior.QC.Jobs.ATI.2014@gmail.com
posts.caption: atisystem.com
posts.description: ATI Systems provide mass notification systems, giant voice systems, community warning systems, tsunami warning systems, tornado warning systems, campus alert systems and emergency warning systems.

posts.message:
سؤال بسيط :
انا حد بعشق ال Programming بس موش مجال عمل اساسى ليا ... فضلت يكون مجال عملى الشبكات ... وبالاخص : Network Security وليس Information Security 
السؤال :
هل لو عندى رغبة ملحة انى اشتغل as a Freelancer ف سنة رابعة كلية مع العلم انى دلوقتى ف تالتة ... واجازة تكفينى ان شاء الله انى احترف لغة برمجة معينة ... هل لغة واحدة تكفى وهل استطيع انى ابتدى مباشرة ف النوع دا من الاعمال الحرة واخيرا لو كدا ترشحولى امشى ف اى Track
 
شكرا :)

posts.caption: heartbleed.com
posts.description: The Heartbleed Bug is a serious vulnerability in the popular OpenSSL cryptographic software library. This weakness allows stealing the information protected, under normal conditions, by the SSL/TLS encryption used to secure the Internet.
